pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Q-CTRLThe Q-CTRL Python package provides an intuitive and convenient Python interfaceto Q-CTRL's quantum control solutions for users of Boulder Opal. Boulder Opalis a versatile Python toolset that provides everything a research team needs toautomate and improve the performance of hardware for quantum computing andquantum sensing.See how you can [get started with BoulderOpal](https://docs.q-ctrl.com/boulder-opal/get-started) today.
